subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Benjamin Raich of Austria won the classic men’s World Cup giant slalom on the steep Kuonisbaergli course in Adelboden, Switzerland, and Bode Miller failed to complete a race for the eighth time in 16 events.
snippet: Benjamin Raich of Austria won the classic men’s World Cup giant slalom on the steep Kuonisbaergli course in Adelboden, Switzerland, and Bode Miller failed to complete a race for the eighth time in 16 events.
